H0.text: Mark David Chapman was scheduled to appear before the New York State parole board next week for his 6th attempt at getting out of prison for the 1980 murder of whom. John Hinckley

H1.text: Mark David Chapman was scheduled to appear before the New York State parole board next week for his 6th attempt at getting out of prison for the 1980 murder of whom. Elvis Presley

H2.text: Mark David Chapman was scheduled to appear before the New York State parole board next week for his 6th attempt at getting out of prison for the 1980 murder of whom. David Bowie

H3.text: Mark David Chapman was scheduled to appear before the New York State parole board next week for his 6th attempt at getting out of prison for the 1980 murder of whom. Lennon

A4.text: Chapman then shot Lennon twice in the back and twice in the shoulder at close range.

A5.text: Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at 11:15 p.m. (EST).
